department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: This request for standing offer is for the supply of fresh fruits
description: Request for Standing Offer for the supply of FRESH FRUIT AND VEGETABLES.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

### Terms of Reference

* **Title**: Fresh Fruit and Vegetables Tender — Globe and Mail Printed
* **Reference Number**: WS4332134318-Doc4346080939
* **Publication Date**: December 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 8, 2024 at 14:00

### Tender Brief

* **Background**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a reliable and efficient provider to supply fresh fruits and vegetables for various government departments.
* **Delivery Locations**: Fresh produce will be delivered to the provinces of Newfoundland and Labrador.
* **Selection Criteria**: The tender will be awarded to the lowest price bidder.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: 
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### End User Entities

The following departments will be utilizing the services of the selected bidder:
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### Government Contacts

For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
* Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC) via email at [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Refer to

To download the original tender announcement in its entirety, please refer to the following link:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18246147?extsite=MTgyNDYxNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
